relation.text: last week , the Roads in my neighbourhood have been totally impaſsable , T for Carriages . So that Rib & I have been close Prisoners . Happily , we are not yet so fashionable , as to be tired of one another ; our solitude consequently proved
no punishment . The vile tenth of March
will not be effected earlier than October
wishes to be absent for Six Months
is well entitled to , having been constantly at Quarters
will never be found on the banks of the Teviot -- Mrs= Dickenson Birch Hall LIVERPOOL Ld Napier 1795
